# The `MemoryDependenceWrapperPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A wrapper analysis pass for the legacy pass manager that exposes a <code>MemoryDepnedenceResults</code> instance. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MemoryDependenceWrapperPass</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A wrapper analysis pass for the legacy pass manager that exposes a <code>MemoryDepnedenceResults</code> instance.
